title: tIrAda vinaigaLai
sahitya:
tIrAda vinaigaLai tIrttiDum kaDavuLE deNDaniTTEn unaiyE ennappanE


anupallavi

  ArAda tuyarellAm AriDam uraippEn aruT-perum jyOtiyE tanip-perum karuNaiyE


caraNam    ellaiyillA ulagat-tollaigaL pala kOTi ellAm unparam enrE eNNi sharaN pughundEn
allum paghalum unnai anbu shei varam aruL aduvE shuddhAnandam appuram Edu bandham
